# Ghoul Touch (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (cloth from a ghoul or earth from a ghoulâ€™s lair)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living humanoid touched

**Duration:** 1d6+2 rounds

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 289

Imbuing you with negative energy, this spell allows you to paralyze a single living humanoid for the duration of the spell with a successful melee touch attack.

A paralyzed subject exudes a carrion stench that causes all living creatures (except you) in a 10-foot-radius spread to become [[Sickened|sickened]] (Fortitude negates). A *[[Neutralize Poison (Spell)|neutralize poison]]* spell removes the effect from a [[Sickened|sickened]] creature, and creatures immune to poison are unaffected by the stench.
